original_title: Bullets, Blood & a Fistful of Ca$h
overview: A hard boiled tale of bloody revenge that interweaves the stories of nine criminals. The story takes place in one day, on the eve of an all out syndicate war. Through a twisted series of events, the interweaving narratives are put on an ultra-violent collision course that will determine, once and for all, who owns the streets.
title: Bullets, Blood & a Fistful of Ca$h
